link_configure.en: Access to  the configuration of the manager for provisioning

link_provisioner.en: Access to the panel of the manager for provisioning

link_provisioner2.en: Access to the panel of the manager for provisioning (Use Case 2)

help_configuration_file.en: The config params are stored at the config file: module_provisionmanager.php that is located at the simpleSAMLphp's config directory, default directory is 'config'. (In order to edit the form, write permission are required)

help_auth.en: Authentication source that protect the Manager. ex 'admin'

help_admin_attr_id.en: Attribute used to identify admin users. ex uid

help_allowed_admins.en: Array of allowed admins, the value of the admin_attr_id's logged user field must match any attribute of the list to get permission for provision. (coma separated values)

help_spentityid.en: EntityID of the SP that protect the App

help_endpoint.en: Attribute Consumer Service endpoint (view for provisioning user in the app)

help_users.en: URL that return a JSON with the userIDs of the registered users on the app

form_errors.en: Form has errors, all fields are required.

help_nowritable.en: You can not edit the configuration. Required writable permission on the config file

config_unsaved.en: There was a problem and the settings could not be saved

source_user_status.en: Status of users from the source at the app
